bio: Thomas Kunc is a software developer, based in Sydney. He currently studies Computer Science at UNSW; and is a Casual Academic at UNSW and Developer at Kinesis.

SGS.desc: Studied for the Higher School Certificate (English Adv.; Math Ext. 2; Latin Ext.; Physics; Studies of Religion)

UNSW.desc: Student for the Bachelor of Science (Computer Science)

desc: Assistant Tutor in COMP1511 (Fundamentals of Computer Science)
Assisted in tutoring COMP1521 (Computer Systems Fundamentals) and COMP2521 (Data Structures and Algorithms)
Developer working on internal and external facing progress.
